body:
Thomas Seebohm wrote:
> 
> Hi Peter,
> 
> I ran rshow with top running in another window and found that the maximum current
> memory usage (RES) was 140MB and the total size of the process (SIZE) was 162MB.
How's the maximum per-user or per-process kernel limit for the process
size configured on your IRIX ?


-Peter




 pab-opto, Freiburg, Germany, www.pab-opto.de
___
